title: Awful FPS
body:
Don't know what happened, but even on the low setting, my FPS is awful.

I turned off all background applications.

Now whenever I alt-tab back into league, the frame stutters, goes to blackness, and then comes back.

Should I reinstall?

Update: Tried restarting computer - no help. Am now repairing the client.

replies.body:
install the newest geforce driver now and see if that was the problem. I am assuming that is my problem. link below talks about how fps was cut in half for some users with last update.
https://www.techpowerup.com/227881/users-report-multiple-issues-with-geforce-375-86-whql-drivers

Nope I fixed the issue.

Had to turn off vertical sync.

I have AMD anyway, lol.

I've seen this a lot over the years and it's typically related to a bad display driver or certain application settings. Our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) covers the most common solutions for this, so I'd recommend giving those steps a try.

Shoot me a reply of the results!

But the FPS Guide covers connections issues correct? I am not having connection issues as I am always a solid 47ms. I am having FPS issue. Last patch I was able to play on High settings. This patch even on Low the exact same issue occurs. Like choppy code.
My bad, I totes linked the wrong guide. I've fixed the link now!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/m9yGAvQH-choppy-locked-screen

I think other people are having the exact same issue I am. Maybe something else is going on?

I might have left this out, but this only started to happen recently; for the past three years I have never experienced the issue. 

I'll try your solutions!
